attributes.action: Group all school staff for the purpose of priority for Covid-19 vaccination
attributes.additional_details: All school staff are exposed on a daily basis to the virus and the more who catch it, the more children will suffer from lack of education. School staff do not have the luxury of working at home  and stand a high chance of being exposed to the virus. All school staff should therefore be teated as a priority group for vaccination.
attributes.background: Include all school staff as a group on the priority list for vaccinations and put this group high enough to receive the vaccine as soon as possible in fair comparison with other groups.
